songs.title: Nobody Knows (Live)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Liam]
Nobody knows, nobody knows but me I sometimes cry
If I could pretend that I'm asleep
When my tears start to fall
I peek out from behind these walls
I think nobody knows, nobody knows

[Verse 2: Liam & (Zayn)]
Nobody likes (nobody likes)
Nobody likes to lose their inner voice (their inner voice)
The one I used to hear before my life made a choice

[Chorus: All]
Baby, oh your secret's safe with me
There's nowhere else in the world that I could ever be
Baby, oh don't it feel like you're all alone
Who's gonna be there when the last angel has flown
And I've lost your way back home
I said nobody knows

[Bridge: Harry]
Tomorrow I'll be there, my friend
I'll pick up and start all over again

[Chorus: All & (Harry)]
Baby, oh your secret's safe with me
There's nowhere else in the world that I could ever be, yeah
Baby, oh don't it feel like you're all alone
Who's gonna be there when the last angel has flown
And I've lost my way back home
I said nobody knows
(I said nobody knows)

[Outro: Liam & (Zayn)]
Nobody knows but me
(Me, yeah)
